FuncDef: This command configures IGMP group interfaces.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the name of the IP interface. If the string contains special characters (#, $, spaces, and so on), the entire string must be enclosed between double quotes.

Specifies the service ID. This is only configured in the retailer VRF. This construct references the wholesaler service under which the group-interface (and the subscriber) is actually defined. Values-1 to 2147483650, svc-name up to 64 char maximum.
